00034 BrisaStateVariable::BrisaStateVariable(QString sendEvents,
00035                                        QString name,
00036                                        QString datatype,
00037                                        QString defaultValue,
00038                                        QString maximum,
00039                                        QString minimum,
00040                                        QString step,
00041                                        QString multicast,
00042                                        QObject *parent) :
00043     QObject(parent)
00044 {
00045     this->nextMulticastSeq = 0;
00046     this->_sendEvents = (sendEvents == "yes");
00047     this->_multicast = (multicast == "yes");
00048     this->_name = name;
00049     this->_dataType = datatype;
00050     this->_defaultValue = defaultValue;
00051     this->_maximum = maximum;
00052     this->_minimum = minimum;
00053     this->_step = step;
00054     this->_value = this->defaultValue;
00055 }
00056 
00057 BrisaStateVariable::BrisaStateVariable(const BrisaStateVariable &variable) :
00058     QObject(variable.parent())
00059 {
00060     this->_sendEvents = variable.sendEventsChange();
00061     this->_name = variable.getAttribute(Name);
00062     this->_dataType = variable.getAttribute(DataType);
00063     this->_defaultValue = variable.getAttribute(DefaultValue);
00064     this->_maximum = variable.getAttribute(Maximum);
00065     this->_minimum = variable.getAttribute(Minimum);
00066     this->_step = variable.getAttribute(Step);
00067     this->_value = variable.getValue();
00068 }
00069 
00070 BrisaStateVariable &BrisaStateVariable::operator=(const BrisaStateVariable &variable) {
00071     if (this != &variable) {
00072         this->nextMulticastSeq = 0;
00073         this->setParent(variable.parent());
00074         this->_sendEvents = variable.sendEventsChange();
00075         this->_name = variable.getAttribute(Name);
00076         this->_dataType = variable.getAttribute(DataType);
00077         this->_defaultValue = variable.getAttribute(DefaultValue);
00078         this->_maximum = variable.getAttribute(Maximum);
00079         this->_minimum = variable.getAttribute(Minimum);
00080         this->_step = variable.getAttribute(Step);
00081         this->_value = variable.getValue();
00082         this->_multicast = variable.multicastEvents();
00083     }
00084     return *this;
00085 }

00087 void BrisaStateVariable::setAttribute(BrisaStateVariableAttribute attr, QVariant newValue) {
00088     switch (attr) {
00089     case SendEvents:
00090     case sendEvents:
00091         this->_sendEvents = (newValue.toString() == "yes");
00092         break;
00093     case Name:
00094     case name:
00095         this->_name = newValue.toString();
00096         break;
00097     case DataType:
00098     case dataType:
00099         this->_dataType = newValue.toString();
00100         break;
00101     case DefaultValue:
00102     case defaultValue:
00103         this->_defaultValue = newValue.toString();
00104         break;
00105     case AllowedValue:
00106     case allowedValue:
00107         this->allowedValueList.append(newValue.toString());
00108         break;
00109     case Minimum:
00110     case minimum:
00111         this->_minimum = newValue.toString();
00112         break;
00113     case Maximum:
00114     case maximum:
00115         this->_maximum = newValue.toString();
00116         break;
00117     case Step:
00118     case step:
00119         this->_step = newValue.toString();
00120         break;
00121     case Value:
00122     case value:
00123         if (this->validateNewValue(newValue) && this->_value != newValue) {
00124             this->_value = newValue;
00125             if (this->_sendEvents) {
00126                 emit this->changed(this);
00127             }
00128         }
00129         break;
00130     case Multicast:
00131     case multicast:
00132         this->_multicast = (newValue.toString() == "yes");
00133         break;
00134     default:
00135         break;
00136     }
00137 }

00139 QString BrisaStateVariable::getAttribute(BrisaStateVariableAttribute attr, int ind) const {
00140     switch (attr) {
00141     case Name:
00142     case name:
00143         return this->_name;
00144         break;
00145     case DataType:
00146     case dataType:
00147         return this->_dataType;
00148         break;
00149     case DefaultValue:
00150     case defaultValue:
00151         return this->_defaultValue;
00152         break;
00153     case AllowedValue:
00154     case allowedValue:
00155         return this->allowedValueList[ind];
00156         break;
00157     case Minimum:
00158     case minimum:
00159         return QString(this->_minimum);
00160         break;
00161     case Maximum:
00162     case maximum:
00163         return QString(this->_maximum);
00164         break;
00165     case Step:
00166     case step:
00167         return QString(this->_step);
00168         break;
00169     case Value:
00170     case value:
00171         return QString(this->_value.toString());
00172         break;
00173     case Multicast:
00174     case multicast:
00175         return QString(this->_multicast);
00176         break;
00177     default:
00178         return "";
00179         break;
00180     }
00181 }

00187 void BrisaStateVariable::addAllowedValue(QString allowedVal) {

00193     this->_name.clear();
00194     this->_dataType.clear();
00195     this->_defaultValue.clear();
00196     this->_maximum.clear();
00197     this->_minimum.clear();

00199     this->_value.clear();

00214 bool BrisaStateVariable::validateNewValue(const QVariant &value) {
00215     QVariant::Type type = this->getDataType();
00216 
00217     if (!value.canConvert(type)) {
00218         qDebug() << "Type mismatch while validating new value for state variable " << this->_name;
00219         return false;
00220     }
00221 
00222     if (type == QVariant::String) {
00223         if (this->allowedValueList.isEmpty())
00224             return true;
00225         if (this->allowedValueList.contains(value.toString())) {
00226             return true;
00227         } else {
00228             qDebug() << "State variable " << this->_name << " does not allows value " << value.toString();
00229             return false;
00230         }
00231 
00232     } else if (type == QVariant::Bool) {
00233         if (value.toString() == "0" || value.toString() == "1"
00234                 || value.toString() == "true" || value.toString() == "false"
00235                 || value.toString() == "yes" || value.toString() == "no") {
00236             return true;
00237         } else {
00238             qDebug() << "Value not allowed for boolean type. Use '0', '1', 'true', 'false', 'yes', or 'no'.";
00239             return false;
00240         }
00241 
00242     } else if (type == QVariant::UInt) {
00243         if (this->_maximum == "" || this->_minimum == "") {
00244             return true;
00245         } else if (value.toUInt() <= this->_maximum.toUInt() && value.toUInt() >= this->_minimum.toUInt()) {
00246             return true;
00247         } else {
00248             qDebug() << "Value out of range for UInt.";
00249             return false;
00250         }
00251 
00252     } else if (type == QVariant::Int) {
00253         if (this->_maximum == "" || this->_minimum == "") {
00254             return true;
00255         } else if (value.toInt() <= this->_maximum.toInt() && value.toInt() >= this->_minimum.toInt()) {
00256             return true;
00257         } else {
00258             qDebug() << "Value out of range for Int.";
00259             return false;
00260         }
00261 
00262     } else if (type == QVariant::Double) {
00263         if (this->_maximum == "" || this->_minimum == "") {
00264             return true;
00265         } else if (value.toDouble() <= this->_maximum.toDouble() && value.toDouble() >= this->_minimum.toDouble()) {
00266             return true;
00267         } else {
00268             qDebug() << "Value out of range for Double.";
00269             return false;
00270         }
00271 
00272     } else {
00273         return true;
00274     }
00275 }

00277 QVariant::Type BrisaStateVariable::getDataType() const {
00278     if (this->_dataType == "ui1") {
00279         return QVariant::UInt;
00280     } else if (this->_dataType == "ui2") {
00281         return QVariant::UInt;
00282     } else if (this->_dataType == "ui4") {
00283         return QVariant::UInt;
00284     } else if (this->_dataType == "i1") {
00285         return QVariant::Int;
00286     } else if (this->_dataType == "i2") {
00287         return QVariant::Int;
00288     } else if (this->_dataType == "i4") {
00289         return QVariant::Int;
00290     } else if (this->_dataType == "int") {
00291         return QVariant::Int;
00292     } else if (this->_dataType == "r4") {
00293         return QVariant::Double;
00294     } else if (this->_dataType == "r8") {
00295         return QVariant::Double;
00296     } else if (this->_dataType == "number") {
00297         return QVariant::Double;
00298     } else if (this->_dataType == "fixed") {
00299         return QVariant::Double;
00300     } else if (this->_dataType == "float") {
00301         return QVariant::Double;
00302     } else if (this->_dataType == "char") {
00303         return QVariant::Char;
00304     } else if (this->_dataType == "string") {
00305         return QVariant::String;
00306     } else if (this->_dataType == "date") {
00307         return QVariant::Date;
00308     } else if (this->_dataType == "dateTime") {
00309         return QVariant::DateTime;
00310     } else if (this->_dataType == "dateTime.tz") {
00311         return QVariant::DateTime;
00312     } else if (this->_dataType == "time") {
00313         return QVariant::Time;
00314     } else if (this->_dataType == "time.tz") {
00315         return QVariant::Time;
00316     } else if (this->_dataType == "boolean") {
00317         return QVariant::Bool;
00318     } else if (this->_dataType == "bin.base64") {
00319         return QVariant::String;
00320     } else if (this->_dataType == "bin.hex") {
00321         return QVariant::String;
00322     } else if (this->_dataType == "uri") {
00323         return QVariant::String;
00324     } else if (this->_dataType == "uuid") {
00325         return QVariant::String;
00326     } else {
00327         return QVariant::Invalid;
00328     }
00329 }

00331 void BrisaStateVariable::setMulticastSeq(quint32 *seq)
00332 {
00333     this->nextMulticastSeq = seq;
00334 }
00335 
00336 quint32 BrisaStateVariable::getNextMulticastSeq()
00337 {
00338     if (*(this->nextMulticastSeq) == 0) {
00339         (*(this->nextMulticastSeq))++;
00340         return 0;
00341     }
00342 
00343     if (*(this->nextMulticastSeq) == 0xFFFFFFFF) /*4294967295L*/
00344         *(this->nextMulticastSeq) = 0;
00345 
00346     return (*(this->nextMulticastSeq))++;
00347 }
